<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/payment-methods/google-pay/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Update an existing Google Pay payment method in the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `payment-method:write`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
